ARABIC: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But as for him who is given his Book behind his back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But he who is given his ledger from behind his back
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But he who is given the Record behind his back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: But as for those whose Book of records will be given behind their backs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And whoever is given his record of deeds behind his back –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But whosoever is given his Record behind his back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And as to him who is given his book behind his back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But as for him who is given his book behind his back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But whoso is given his account behind his back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but as for him whose record shall be given to him from behind his back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And as to him who shall be given his book from behind his back-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But as for him who is given his record from behind his back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But he who is given his Record behind his back,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But whosoever is given his Record behind his back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But he who is given his Book from behind his back
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But as for him who is given his book behind his back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:10] But as for him who is given his book from behind his back — and this is the disbeliever, whose right hand is chained to his neck and whose left hand, by which he is given the book, is placed behind his back,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But whoso is given his account) the account of his evil deeds (behind his back) in his left hand, referring here to al-Aswad Ibn 'Abd al-Asad, the brother of Abu Salamah,
